---
title: "Research unit 'Rehabilitation & Learning': the Re-Learn Lab"
---

The research unit is doing research in field of rehabilitation and acquisition of motor skills.

We investigate and design rehabilitation assessments and interventions in various settings. A focus is on the rehabilitation of older people and people with neurological disorders.

This website provides information on the Re-Learn Team and details of ongoing projects.

A special focus of our research unit are systematic reviews.

Should you be a student seeking a potential topic for a Bachelor's or Master's thesis, we would be pleased to hear from you.
